mapper.select: SELECT A.LM_LotNo, A.LM_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name LM_ItemName, A.LM_Qty, A.LM_Qty lm_TransQty, A.LM_Create_Date, A.LM_Warehouse, C.Child_TBL_Type LM_Warehouse_Name, B.Product_Info_STND_1 LM_STND_1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 LM_STND_2, D.Child_TBL_Type LM_Item_Unit_Name, E.Child_TBL_Type LM_Item_Material_Name FROM LotMaster_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.LM_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL C on A.LM_Warehouse = C.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL D on B.Product_Unit = D.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL E on B.Product_Material = E.Child_TBL_No where A.LM_Qty > 0 and B.Product_MTRL_CLSFC in ('24','25','26') and A.LM_Warehouse != '50' and A.LM_LotNo like concat('%',#{lotNo},'%')

SELECT A.LM_LotNo, A.LM_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name LM_ItemName, A.LM_Qty, A.LM_Create_Date, A.LM_Warehouse, C.Child_TBL_Type LM_Warehouse_Name, B.Product_Info_STND_1 LM_STND_1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 LM_STND_2, D.Child_TBL_Type LM_Item_Unit_Name, E.Child_TBL_Type LM_Item_Material_Name FROM LotMaster_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.LM_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL C on A.LM_Warehouse = C.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL D on B.Product_Unit = D.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL E on B.Product_Material = E.Child_TBL_No where A.LM_Qty > 0 and B.Product_MTRL_CLSFC in ('24','25','26') and A.LM_ItemCode like concat('%',#{itemCode},'%') and A.LM_LotNo like concat('%',#{lotNo},'%')

SELECT lmt.*, pit.Product_Item_Name LM_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 LM_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type LM_Item_CLSFC_1, spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo FROM LotMaster_tbl lmt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON lmt.LM_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No LEFT OUTER JOIN Sales_Packing_tbl spt ON lmt.LM_LotNo = spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo WHERE lmt.LM_Qty != 0 AND lmt.LM_LotNo = #{LM_LotNo} AND lmt.LM_LotNo LIKE 'S%' AND lmt.LM_Warehouse = '51' AND spt.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo is null
